author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ooma Q4 Non-Gaap Loss Per Share $0.03
text:
March 6 (Reuters) - Ooma Inc:
* OOMA REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL YEAR 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* SEES Q1 2019 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.04 TO $0.06
* SEES FY 2019 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.13 TO $0.23
* SEES Q1 2019 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.19 TO $0.21 * Q4 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.03
* SEES Q1 2019 REVENUE $29.5 MILLION TO $30 MILLION * QTRLY TOTAL REVENUE WAS $30.2 MILLION, UP 10% YEAR-OVER-YEAR
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.04, REVENUE VIEW $29.5 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.03, REVENUE VIEW $29.8 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2019 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.01, REVENUE VIEW $123.7 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
